pkgmetadata.longdescription: sphinx-serve------------Simple utility to easier preview your sphinx documentation.After running the sphinx-serve command, it tries to detect thesphinx build directory. It examines the current working directoryand if the build directory is not present, it tries to iteratethe parent paths. If a build directory is detected it launchesan http server.The build directory name is configurable. It also supports servingdocumentation from the html folder of the singlehtml folder.Installation------------ pip install sphinx-serveUsage-----Run with: sphinx-serveFor all available options use: sphinx-serve --help
